Topic.Title: How to make typerwriter text only display once?

Posts.EditableText:
I am  not the best at coding, at all, so I can't wrap my head around how to display the text only once, instead of on all the pages? Is it even possible?
I am using the desktop version of Quest to make a Gamebook, and using the latest version. I believe 5.7
 Any help would be very appreciated! :D
Posts.HTML:
I am not the best at coding, at all, so I can't wrap my head around how to display the text only once, instead of on all the pages? Is it even possible?

Posts.EditableText: I do not understand the problem. If the type of the page is "Script + Text" and you use the typewriter under script, the text is only displayed on this page
Posts.HTML: I do not understand the problem. If the type of the page is "Script + Text" and you use the typewriter under script, the text is only displayed on this page

Posts.EditableText: Ohhh, well, you answered the question, thanks! I didn't know I could change the page type xD
Posts.HTML: Ohhh, well, you answered the question, thanks! I didn't know I could change the page type xD
